translations: n．（公共场所的）斗殴，骚乱：在公共场所发生的暴力行为，通常涉及两个或更多的人之间的争斗。
· The police were called to break up the affrays.

sentences.sentence: the number of people gathered to engage in affrays is large and so is the scale, thus bringing about a bad effect on society;
sentences.translation: 聚众斗殴人数多，规模大，社会影响恶劣的；
